description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Torquay, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Elegant Great Ocean Road Torquay Escape Steps from Zeally Bay Beach with Indoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the sheer coastal bliss of Victoria's picturesque Surf Coast with an escape to this stylish retreat in Torquay, ideally sitting across Zeally Bay Beach. The perfect launchpad for exploring the unrivalled beauty of the Great Ocean Road, this resort offers a blend of modern comfort with classic charms, featuring spacious, well-appointed accommodations to ensure utmost relaxation. Take a dip in the heated indoor pool, pamper with treatments at the outdoor spa, play tennis or indulge in culinary delights at the onsite bar and cafe. From surf lessons, vibrant dining and farmers markets, to reef walks and fishing charters, you'll be perfectly placed to take advantage of everything the Great Ocean Road has to offer.

hotels.title: Great Ocean Road Coastal Resort with 18-Hole Championship Course & Three Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Wind your way along the coast of Victoria to this coastal haven, elegantly perched on the northern headland of Torquay - the starting point of the Great Ocean Road. Spend your days exploring one of Australia's most famed stretches of coastline and come back to an expansive 25-metre heated indoor pool for a refreshing swim. Try your hand at a round of tennis or pull up a pew at the 20-metre-long Shirley’s bar and savour your favourite drink. The Sands Torquay is perched on an 18-hole championship golf course designed by former Australian professional golfer Stuart Appleby. Take the short drive into Torquay township where you'll find boutiques and gourmet bites or travel a little further afield to the wonders of the Great Ocean Road, including the the spectacular Twelve Apostles.

seo.title: Hôtels à Torquay - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Torquay, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
